Nicaraguan President on Friendly and Cooperative Ties with DPRK
articles.content:
Nicaraguan President on Friendly and Cooperative Ties with DPRK 
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Sandinist National Liberation Front and the government of Nicaragua will boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK in the future, too, as in the past.
 Daniel Ortega Saavedra, secretary general of the Sandinist National Liberation Front of Nicaragua and Nicaraguan president, said this on Jan. 10 when meeting the DPRK ambassador to Nicaragua who is special envoy of the Korean government attending the inaugural ceremony of the president.    
 I always remember President Kim Il Sung who extended material and moral support and firm solidarity to Nicaragua in the past and received me, he said, hoping that the WPK and the Korean people would register great successes in socialist construction under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

U.S. Delegation's Tour of S. Korea Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Delegation's Tour of S. Korea Denounced 
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of All-People Campaign for Checking south Korea-U.S. Free Trade Agreement reportedly called a press conference at Inchon Airport on Jan. 14 to denounce the U.S. delegation's tour of south Korea for the sixth round of negotiations for the conclusion of south Korea-U.S. FTA.
 Speakers at the press conference said that the negotiations for the conclusion of FTA are being reduced into unfair negotiations with passage of time as they serve to meet the unilateral demands of the U.S. side only.    
 The negotiations are no longer needed as they are nothing but a trick to pull the wool over the eyes of the people, they said, urging the U.S. delegation to immediately leave south Korea.

Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Abdelaziz Bouteflika, President of Algeria, on the occasion of the New Year.
 The gift was handed over to an official of the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Jan.12.

Iranian Foreign Ministry Delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Iranian foreign ministry headed by its Vice-Minister Mahdi Safari arrived here Thursday by air.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Australia Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Australia Appointed
   Pyongyang, January 18 (KCNA) -- Pang Song Hae was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Australia according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
